==Gameplay==
==Gameplay==
[[Image:Prisoners of the Sun (PC game) - Beginning of the first level.png|thumb|left|The beginning of the first level]]
[[Image:Prisoners of the Sun (PC game) - Beginning of the first level.png|thumb|left|The beginning of the first level]]
  +
[[Image:Prisoners of the Sun (PC game)- Second level.png|thumb|left|The beginning of the second level]]
The gameplay to this game is similar the other two Tintin games released for the PC [[Tintin in Tibet (video game)|Tintin in Tibet]] and [[Destination Adventure]]. This was the third [[Tintin and Snowy|Tintin]] game, and was the last of Tintin in gaming for a few years.
